plot: Summer replacement show with the three panelists attempting to guess a celebrity's name after viewing articles of clothing or props associated with him or her.
plot_en: Summer replacement show with the three panelists attempting to guess a celebrity's name after viewing articles of clothing or props associated with him or her.
plot_es: Summer replacement show with the three panelists attempting to guess a celebrity's name after viewing articles of clothing or props associated with him or her.
title: Who's There?
